DataElement.preferredName: Study Site Investigator Contact Person Telecommunication Address ISO21090.DSET.TEL.v1.0
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A facility in which study/protocol activities are conducted.:An individual who conducts scientific research. In a clinical setting this individual actually conducts and/or supervises the clinical investigation and study-related procedures.  The investigator monitors the safety of the trial subjects and investigational staff (under whose immediate direction an agent is administered or dispensed to a subject).  The investigator collects and analyses data and study documents, and provides reports in compliance with applicable requirements.:A person acting as a channel for communication between groups or on behalf of a group._The value for a particular telecommunication address used as the contact telecommunication information for a person or organization._A collection containing unordered distinct/discrete values of the type TEL.

Concepts.definition: A facility in which study/protocol activities are conducted.

An individual who conducts scientific research. In a clinical setting this individual actually conducts and/or supervises the clinical investigation and study-related procedures.  The investigator monitors the safety of the trial subjects and investigational staff (under whose immediate direction an agent is administered or dispensed to a subject).  The investigator collects and analyses data and study documents, and provides reports in compliance with applicable requirements.
A person acting as a channel for communication between groups or on behalf of a group.
